celldancer.cdplt.scatter_geneÂ¶

celldancer.cdplt.scatter_gene(ax=None, x=None, y=None, cellDancer_df=None, colors=None, custom_xlim=None, custom_ylim=None, vmin=None, vmax=None, alpha=0.5, s=5, velocity=False, gene=None, legend='off', arrow_grid=(15, 15))Â¶

Plot the velocity (splice-unsplice) of a gene, or plot the parameter (âalphaâ, âbetaâ, âgammaâ, âspliceâ, âunspliceâ) in pseudotime, or customize the parameters in x-axis and y-axis of a gene.

Parameters

  • ax (ax of plt.subplots()) â ax to add subplot.

  • x (str) â Set x axis as one of {âspliceâ, âunspliceâ, âalphaâ, âbetaâ, âgammaâ, âpseudotimeâ}.

  • y (str) â Set y axis as one of {âspliceâ, âunspliceâ, âalphaâ, âbetaâ, âgammaâ, âpseudotimeâ}.

  • cellDancer_df (pandas.DataFrame) â Dataframe of velocity estimation, cell velocity, and pseudotime results. Columns=[âcellIndexâ, âgene_nameâ, âunspliceâ, âspliceâ, âunsplice_predictâ, âsplice_predictâ, âalphaâ, âbetaâ, âgammaâ, âlossâ, âcellIDâ, âclustersâ, âembedding1â, âembedding2â, âvelocity1â, âvelocity2â, âpseudotimeâ]

  • colors (list, dict, or str) â When the input is a list: build a colormap dictionary for a list of cell type; When the input is a dictionary: the customized color map dictionary of each cell type; When the input is a str: one of {âalphaâ, âbetaâ, âgammaâ, âspliceâ, âunspliceâ, âpseudotimeâ} is used as value of color.

  • custom_xlim (optional, float (default: None)) â Set the x limit of the current axes.

  • custom_ylim (optional, float (default: None)) â Set the y limit of the current axes.

  • vmin (optional, float (default: None)) â Set the minimum color limit of the current image.

  • vmax (optional, float (default: None)) â Set the maximum color limit of the current image.

  • alpha (optional, float (default: 0.5)) â The alpha blending value, between 0 (transparent) and 1 (opaque).

  • s (optional, float (default: 5)) â The marker size.

  • velocity (optional, bool (default: False)) â True if velocity in gene level is to be plotted.

  • gene (optional, str (default: None)) â Gene selected to be plotted.

  • legend (optional, str (default: âoffâ)) â âoffâ if the color map of cell type legend is not to be plotted; âonlyâ if only plot the cell type legend.

  • arrow_grid (optional, tuple (default: (15,15))) â The sparsity of the grids of velocity arrows. The larger, the more compact and more arrows will be shown.

Returns

ax

Return type

matplotlib.axes.Axes
